changeSet.author: ypashynskyi
changeSet.sql: update pm_review r set properties = jsonb_set(properties #- '{how_archieved}', '{how_achieved}', properties #> '{how_archieved}') where r.properties ? 'how_archieved';

rollback.sql: update pm_review r set properties = jsonb_set(properties #- '{how_achieved}', '{how_archieved}', properties #> '{how_achieved}') where r.properties ? 'how_achieved';

changeSet.author: ypashynskyi
changeSet.sql: update pm_cycle c set metadata = replace(metadata::text, 'strategic_priority', 'strategic_driver')::jsonb where c.uuid in ('3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6', '3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa9');

rollback.sql: update pm_cycle c set metadata = replace(metadata::text, 'strategic_driver', 'strategic_priority')::jsonb where c.uuid in ('3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6', '3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa9');

changeSet.author: ypashynskyi
changeSet.sql: update pm_cycle c set metadata = replace(metadata::text, 'Strategic priority', 'Strategic driver')::jsonb where c.uuid in ('3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6', '3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa9');

rollback.sql: update pm_cycle c set metadata = replace(metadata::text, 'Strategic driver', 'Strategic priority')::jsonb where c.uuid in ('3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6', '3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa9');
